Description:
Main responsibilities:Support Group HR Manager in recruitment by ensuring proper job description for each position, filtering CVs & arranging for interviews with concerned HOD’s.
Conduct both onboarding and offboarding procedures for all employees.
Facilitate application of new KSA Residence visas, work permits and visa renewals.
Collation of mandatory documents of staff to keep an updated records for everyone & for visa process.
Implementation, preparation, maintenance and updating of company HR policies when required by Group HR Manager.
Preparation of payroll & processing it with Finance Department.
Maintain Company files and records including licenses renewal...etc.
Arrange travel and accommodation as and when required by the company.
Handling all HR and Admin employee related issues including review of claims…etc.
Maintain and liaise with the company’s health insurance provider in regard to renewals.
Ensuring that all office set-up is completed in an efficient manner and a high standard is achieved.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in human resources or similar degree.
Minimum 2-3 years of experience in Human Resources
Proficiency in using Microsoft Outlook, Word and Excel.
Knowledgeable in KSA Labor Law.
Presentable and possess excellent communication and written skills in English.
